movie_title: Ugly History: The El Mozote murders - Diana Sierra Becerra
introduction: Get to know the story of Radio Venceremos, an underground radio collective that fought US-backed fas

vocabulary.example: The atrocities committed during the war shocked the world.

vocabulary.definition: a violent uprising against an authority or government
vocabulary.example: The rebels planned an insurrection to overthrow the oppressive regime.

vocabulary.definition: the deliberate killing of a large number of people from a particular nation or ethnic group with the aim of destroying that nation or group
vocabulary.example: The international community condemned the genocide that took place in the region.

vocabulary.definition: kept secret or done secretively, especially because illicit
vocabulary.example: The group operated a clandestine network to communicate their plans.

vocabulary.definition: to block or be in the way of something moving forward
vocabulary.example: The government's actions continued to obstruct the investigation into the corruption scandal.

vocabulary.definition: the removal or obliteration of something
vocabulary.example: The erasure of historical records hindered the understanding of past events.
